record.titleTypeName: Business School, National Association of Retail Grocers, 1952
record.description: Left to right: Mrs. Garfield V. Cox; William Vatter (professor of accounting, University of Chicago); Harold S. Glenzer (secretary, Cleveland Retail Grocers Association); Mrs. Lorena Abbott (secretary, Memphis Retail Grocers Association); William B. Harrell (business manager, special projects, University of Chicago); S. Frank Straus (secretary, Virginia Food Dealers Association); Mrs. William Vatter; Lee S. Thomson (National Association of Retail Grocers produce director). [Photograph gift of the Graduate School of Business, May 1965].
record.subject3: University of Chicago. Graduate School of Business
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
